Demo apps!

  • Kalei - A living CSS styleguide - Built with Backbone.js using these principles
  • ClientManager - Sample application built with Backbone, RequireJS, Twitter Bootstrap on the client and Node.js (Express.js, Mongoose) on the server.
  • Backbone-relational Tutorial - Nested Models With Backbone.js
  • A clean opensource web application to write and organize your ideas, using Backbone, RequireJS, jQueryUI, Node.js, login with Twitter and more.
